name: Allure TestOps Support
description:
IntelliJ IDEA plug-in for Allure TestOps allows you

To send test results from IntelliJ IDEA to Allure TesOps server

  • Test results from IntelliJ IDEA will be sent to Allure Server and new Launch with test results will be created.

To assign AllureID for your tests in the code

  • Main identifier for a test is full qualified name. If you modify any of the parts of the full path, then a test case with old full path will become an orphan.
  • If you assign AllureID to your test cases in your code, then any changed to the code will automatically update test cases in Allure and there will be no orphans.

To create templates for your manual test cases automation

  • By using an empty method in your code you need to assign AllureID of a manual test case from Allure TestOps test cases, then use **Allure Automate** command and you will get a template for an automated test case with step-based logic in IntelliJ IDEA.
  • The steps of new test case will be the same as for the manual test case from Allure TestOps server.
  • You can either make a clone of the manual test case or fully
